LanguageData.ComponentWheelRoad.label: road wheel
LanguageData.ComponentWheelRoad.description: A metallic wheel that is capable to withstand heavier chassis, it's also the frame of tyre.
LanguageData.ComponentWheelTire.label: tyre
LanguageData.ComponentWheelTire.description: An advanced wheel consisting of an air-filled outer wheel and a metal rim.
